first.speaker: Alex
first.content: This time travel is almost end..

0.speaker: Alex
0.content: Though it is fun, I actually expected something more special. Like..

1.speaker: Alex
1.content: OMG A COMET IS ATTACKING A PLANET!!

3.speaker: Alex
3.content: YES! I SAVED a planet! That's what I want to do!

4.content: I'm a hero to this planet! Wait..

6.content: ROBOT:'It is the earth in the Late Cretaceous.

7.content: Oh what did I do.. did I save.. DINOSAURS?

8.content: ROBOT: 'This is the end of your time travel.'

9.content: ROBOT: 'Sending you back...Your bahavior would affect things in your timeline'

11.content: You are sending back to your time on the earth, and because of you saved dinosaurs from the comet, they become the master of the earth.

12.content: You are captured by them, luckily, they think you look special, so instead of eating you, they put you into a zoo.

13.content: Somehow you can understand them, but they can't understand you.

14.content: My my. You are really a weird monkey.

15.content: I hope they want to see you. If you can't earn enough money for me, guess who will pay your food?

16.content: Nobody. But we don't want that happen right?

17.content: Be a good monkey and behave yourself, I'll feed you if you earn enough money, alright?
